name: Trivia All Day
description:
If you enjoy learning and answering general knowledge questions, racing against the clock to advance to the next level, and ultimately conquering the Legend category, Trivia All Day is the right app for you.

This app is suited for all ages and the content is presented with varying topics and increasing difficulty in five categories: Novice, Beginner, Expert, Master, and Legend with 10 levels in each category. There are 1000 questions about arts, animals, biology, chemistry, earth, food, geography, history, music, math, matter, nature, physics, technology, space, plants, water, weather, sports, and more.

It is strongly recommended to start with the Novice category and work all the way up to the next category. In each category, you will have 10 seconds to answer a question. To advance to the next level, you will need a minimum score as shown:

Levels 1-3: answer at least 75% of the questions
Levels 4-6: answer at least 80% of the questions
Levels 7-8: answer at least 90% of the questions
Levels 9-10: answer 100% of the questions

At each level, you can check your score for that level. In addition, there is a scoreboard that captures and shows your overall score for each category. Ambient background music, which can be turned off, makes for a pleasant experience.
